mode.description: progress 的模式，可选值为 linear, circle
mode.description_zh: progress 的模式，可选值为 linear, circle

type.description: 类型，可选值为 default primary info success warning danger
type.description_zh: 类型，可选值为 default primary info success warning danger

color.description: The color of the progress (please use the object, the gradient is the same as the linearGradient element of svg for the annular progress bar)
color.description_zh: progress 的颜色 (环形进度条设置渐变色请使用object, 渐变同svg的linearGradient元素)

track-color.description: The color of the progress track

label.description: Whether or not to display the label

label-class.description: Customize the class name of the label
label-class.description_zh: 自定义 label 的类名

track.description: Whether to display the track for progress
track.description_zh: 是否显示 progress 的轨道

size.description: Dimensions of progress (circular progress bar only)
size.description_zh: progress 的尺寸（仅支持环形进度条）

rotate.description: Origin of progress (only circular progress bar is supported)
rotate.description_zh: progress 的原点（仅支持环形进度条）
